price: Kuma suka ce: "Ku kasance* Yahũdãwa ko Nasãra, kwã shiryu."Ka ce: "A'a aƙidar Ibrãhĩm dai, maikarkata, zuwa ga gaskiya, kuma bai kasance daga mãsu shirki ba."
arabic: وَقَالُواْ كُونُواْ هُودًا أَوۡ نَصَٰرَىٰ تَهۡتَدُواْۗ قُلۡ بَلۡ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
footnotes: * Yahũdu suka ce: "Ku kasance Yahũdawa ku shiryu" Nasãra suka ce: "Ku kasance Nasãraku shiryu". Allah Ya nũna addinin Yahũdu da na Nasãra yã sãɓãwa abin da suke yi, su duka biyu, kuma yã sãɓawa na mushirikai.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū kūnū hūdan aw naṣārā tahtadū qul bal millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
